title: Should we mint 25% if the possible 21m FledgeCoin to the Gnosis Vault?
body:
I propose minting 5,239,703 FledgeCoin to the Gnosis Safe.  This is 25% of the total possible supply.  Currently, there are 10,297 Fledge coin in existence in four wallets.  10k to Gnosis and 99 to three wallets to get the party started. 

The coins will be used as follows:
1) Public Sale: 3.465m
2) Marketing: 157,000
3) Development: 892,500
4) Treasury: 525,000
5) Founders: 210,000 to be shared by founders (founders determined by future Snapshot vote) and locked by each founder for one year on Unicrypt
author: 0xCb81A9Fc572adF7656E5e2F36CFc48d09F4b937E
